sourcesContent: import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Card,Button,Badge,Row,Col,Container} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Navigate} from 'react-router-dom' import './AttendanceCard.css' const Post = ({name,avatar,tag,scontent,dcontent}) => { return ( {course} CLASS NUMBER: {classNo} PROFESSOR: {profName} OPENS {startTime.toString()} CLOSES {endTime} ) } export default Post
